frameDefinitions: Because it no longer functions adequately under the given circumstances, an Agent (or non-Agentive Cause) undertakes steps to change the structural makeup of a complex Entity with interdependent parts, for instance an institution or a system of laws.
A Grower endeavors to tend to and influence the environment of Food so as to foster its growth.
An Agent or Cause is responsible for placing a Valued_entity at risk.
The Creator creates a new entity, the Created_entity, possibly out of Components.

This frame consists of words that indicate that an Agent or a Cause affects the position of an Item on some scale (the Attribute) to change it from an initial value (Value_1) to an end value (Value_2).
A Destroyer (a conscious entity) or Cause (an event, or an entity involved in such an event) affects the Patient negatively so that the Patient no longer exists.
frameExamples: They want to <t>reform</t> the law on Sunday trading.
His actions have <t>imperiled</t> his immortal soul!
The Libyans were <t>generating</t> arms for export.
The company is <t>raising</t> the final dividend from 4.34p to 4.57p, to boost the total by 5.3 percent to 6.36p.
listRoleDefinitions: The sentient entity that effects a change in the <fen>Entity</fen>.

This role denotes a complex, abstract, human-created entity with interdependent parts which has either deteriorated or is no longer adequate for its purpose given a change in circumstances and which the <fen>Agent</fen> therefore wants to modify.
This role is for non-human causes, such as a processes or institutions, responsible for reform.
The time at which the change of the <fen>Entity</fen> is caused.
The place where the reformation occurs.
The <fen>Grower</fen> is the agent growing <fen>Food</fen>.

<fex name='Food'>Food</fex> is the item grown by the <fen>Grower</fen>, which can include things not traditionally eaten, like flowers, etc., or items for other consumption-related uses, like medicines, smokables, etc.
When the growing event occurs.
The greater geographic location where the <fen>Grower</fen> grows <fen>Food</fen>.
An (non-sentient) entity or state of affairs that leads to the peril to the Valued_entity.
The entity which may be negatively impacted as a result of the emperilment.
The sentient entity which causes the risk to the <fen>Valued_entity</fen>.
The time when the <fen>Valued_entity</fen> is put in danger.
The location where the <fen>Valued_entity</fen> is put in danger.
The Creator creates a created entity.
This role identifies the entity that the Agent intentionally creates.
This role identifes the Time when an Agent intentionally creates a new entity.
This role identifies the place ehere the Agent intentionally creates the new entity.
The person who causes an entity (Item) to change its positon on a scale with respect to some property (Variable).
The scale along which the <fen>Item</fen> ranges in value.
The entity whose position along a scale is being changed.
The force that causes the change.
When the event occurs.
The location where the <fen>Agent</fen> changes the value of an <fen>Attribute</fen>.
The conscious entity, generally a person, that performs the intentional action that results in the <fen>Patient</fen>'s destruction.
The entity which is destroyed by the <fen>Destroyer</fen>.
The event or entity which is responsible for the destruction of the <fen>Patient</fen>.
This role identifies the time when the <fen>Destroyer</fen> destroys the <fen>Patient</fen>.
This role identifies the place where the <fen>Destroyer</fen> destroys the <fen>Patient</fen>.
listRoleExamples: Particular attention will be devoted to recent proposals to reform <fex>UK competition policy</fex>.
Thus , <fex>radical reform</fex> restructures rape offences in ways that it is hoped will facilitate the prosecution process without jeopardising the interests of the accused .
The House of Representatives, on a bipartisan basis, sought to reform the program <fex>this year</fex>.
<fex>The rain</fex> increased the river's flow rate to an astonishing million gallons per second.
As a result, they raised prices <fex>in Peoria</fex>.
<fex>The subsequent explosions</fex> leveled most downtown office buildings.
passageSentences: host凤凰网：梁文道在佛教中寻找人生方向

sourceCandidateSpans.text: the New Zealand Society of Rationalists and Humanists
